entry.def: The foothills of a mountain or a range of mountains are the lower hills or mountains around its base.

example.ex: Pasadena lies in the foothills of the San Gabriel mountains.
example.tran: 帕萨迪纳坐落于圣加布里埃尔山麓的丘陵地带。

means.word_mean: 1. hilly land on the lower slopes of mountains
